SELECT m.module_id AS moduleId, m.module_name AS moduleName, e.exam_date AS examDate, e.exam_site AS examSite, e.exam_start_time AS examStartTime, e.exam_end_time AS examEndTime, e.exam_duration AS examDuration, e.exam_desc AS examDes FROM student s JOIN programme p ON s.programme_id = p.programme_id JOIN module m ON p.programme_id = m.programme_id JOIN exam e ON m.module_id = e.module_id
WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId}
